ontA.label: Cohort (Metadata)
ontA.comment: An ontological representation of the Cohort parameters. The ontology has been automatically generated based on the uploaded Excel Document with Cohort Metadata (extracted on Date: 2019-05-27). This document has been also automatically generated based on the data recorded about 507 patients. For each patient, there are 156 Fields (Parameters aka Properties), the value of which often come from one out of 111 different controlled Set of Terms. Metadata extracted have been revised by technical experts (in close collaboration with clinical experts).
ontA.creator: Institute of Communications and Computer Systems of National Technical University of Athens - ICCS/NTUA

ontB.label: HarmonicSS - Reference Model and Vocabularies
ontB.comment:
This ontology specifies the parameters of particular interest for the diagnosis, control and/or treatment of patients associated with the primary Sjogren Syndrome (pSS). 

The design of the ontology was driven by the documents with the minimum and maximum pSS parameters (D.4.1 revised) prepared by the Clinical Partners participating in the HarmonicSS project.

jsonarray.simcomments: The concepts have the same name. Strings "Asian" and "Asian" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Caucasian" and "Caucasian" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Female" and "Female" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Male" and "Male" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Active" and "Active " consist of the same main elements.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Never smoker" and "Never Smoker" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "PSORIASIS" and "Psoriasis" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "RAYNAUD'S" and "Raynaud's Phenomenon" consist of the same main elements.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "RHEUMATOID ARTHRITIS" and "Rheumatoid arthritis" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Bone Marrow" and "Bone Marrow" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Lymph Nodes" and "Lymph Nodes" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Other MALT site" and "Other MALT site" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Other non-MALT site" and "Other non-MALT site" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Salivary Gland" and "Salivary Gland" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Spleen" and "Spleen" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Stomach" and "Stomach" consist of the same sequence of characters.
There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "INTERSTITIAL NEPHRITIS" and "Interstitial Nephritis" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "RHEUMATOID ARTHRITIS" and "Rheumatoid arthritis" consist of the same sequence of characters.

proparray.propertyname: EULAR Sjogren's Syndrome Patient Reported Index (ESSPRI) Pain score

directTransformation.description: Provides the values of the parameters specified in the right side taking into account the patient data in the given fields as well as additional parameters provided. The value of the 1st Field should be an integer. For specifying whether the score was normal or not (Assessment), at least one of the two optional properties about UNL and/or DNL should be given.

proparray.propertyname: Oral Sicca Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) score

directTransformation.description: Provides the values of the parameters specified in the right side taking into account the patient data in the given fields as well as additional parameters provided. The value of the 1st Field should be an integer. For specifying whether the score was normal or not (Assessment), at least one of the two optional properties about UNL and/or DNL should be given.

Provides the corresponding Reference Model term (i.e., Symptom/Sign) or not, taking into account the value of the given Field and the Mapping Rules specified (i.e., align Field Values with Confirmation Terms).

Provides the corresponding Reference Model term (i.e., Symptom/Sign) or not, taking into account the value of the given Field and the Mapping Rules specified (i.e., align Field Values with Confirmation Terms).

arguments.argname: UNL and DNL Unit of Measurement

directTransformation.description: Provides the appropriate Term for the specific Lab Test and the Outcome Assessment based on the Value of the given Field, the parameters provided (i.e., corresponding Reference Model) and Mapping Rules specified. Also, provided that the UNL and DNL specified (including Unit of Measurement), the Normal Range of Values will be also recorded.

proparray.propertyname: EULAR Sjogren's syndrome Disease Activity Index (ESSDAI) score
EULAR Sjogren's syndrome Disease Activity Index (ESSDAI) date

directTransformation.description: Provides the values of the parameters specified in the right side taking into account the patient data in the given fields as well as additional parameters provided. The value of the 1st Field should be an integer. The Date will be recorded provided that the value of the second field is not empty and the data follow the given format. For specifying whether the score was normal or not (Assessment), at least one of the two optional properties about UNL and/or DNL should be given.

Provides the appropriate Term for the specific Lab Test and the Outcome measured based on the Value of the given Fields and the additional parameters provided (i.e., corresponding Reference Model term, multiplier and Unit of Measurement). In case the 1st Field is empty no data will be recorded.
